testcase.name: As booking user I select a destination and reserve a hotel
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I enter the Booking application✅ When I enter the destination "cusco" and reservation date "14 March 2024" and "16 March 2024"✅ And I enter the number of rooms "1" adults "1" and children "1"✅ And I tap the search button✅ Then I select the hotel

testcase.name: As booking user I want a hotel but the destination is not selected
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I enter the Booking application✅ When I tap the search button✅ Then I validate the message please enter your destination

testcase.name: As booking user I want a hotel but I select a destination that does not exist
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I enter the Booking application✅ When I enter a destination that does not exist "34567sd"✅ Then I validate the message Sorry but we cant find anything that matches your search

testcase.name: As booking user I select a hotel but select the sort by button
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I enter the Booking application✅ When I enter the destination "cusco" and reservation date "14 March 2024" and "16 March 2024"✅ And I enter the number of rooms "1" adults "1" and children "1"✅ And I tap the search button✅ Then I select the sort button and sort by "Stars (5 to 0)"
